consent.title: We value your privacy
consent.body: We don’t store your personal data on our servers. Cookies are used only to power essential features and to run analysis/calculations for your health results. Your inputs are processed for calculation and saved only in your browser as cookies (not sent to us). You can accept or reject.

lines.essential: Essential Cookies: Required for the site to function and to remember things like consent and language.
lines.analytics: Analysis/Calculation Cookies: Used to perform on-page analysis and calculations for your health results; data stays in your browser.
lines.personalization: Personalization Cookies: Save your preferences (e.g., units, selections) to tailor diet and exercise suggestions; not shared with our servers.
